dialogue.utterance: Have you guys heard about the latest trends in crypto assets? I find the <target_01> decentralized finance </target_01> <aspect_01> accessibility </aspect_01> to be <opinion_01> revolutionary </opinion_01>, as it allows anyone to invest regardless of their background.

dialogue.utterance: Speaking of transparency, I recently read about <target_02> NFTs </target_02>. Their <aspect_04> uniqueness </aspect_04> is <opinion_04> fascinating </opinion_04>, providing a new way to own digital art and collectibles.
